page.title: 17ALLESLEY PARK ESTATE
page.content:
{I like Allesley Park Estate}because there are convenient shops which sell all sorts of things. There is a park with swings, a slide, a roundabout, a seesaw and a climbing frame. Our school sometimes has sponsored walks round the park; the money we raise goes towards paying for school equipment.
Just up the road there is a community centre where there is a youth club; brownies and guides are held there too, whilst car boot sales and dancing lessons have started there recently. There are also quite good bus services and the roads are fairly quiet.
At night if you stand on top of the hill you can see the city all lit up and it looks like a model village.
